Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Removed public name
01.03.2011 SH SCR16238 Added new admin currency logic (removed GNRL_CURRENCY)
16.09.2009 SH SCR14906 Added update BTCH_USRIDENTERED (2 times)
10.12.2008 SH SCR14182 Added check if difference bookings via
BPH113 (BP0038.PO.ALLPAYD<>0) must be reported to MQ100
27.02.2007 SH SCR12296 Added verifies to parts where BTCH is updated in case of
LinkQuery on BTCH failed
25.07.2006 SH SCR11623 Removed special handling for BPIV_VARIABLETEXT
in case of GNRL_CODE = NL, see also SCR 8771 from 09.08.2005
21.07.2006 SH SCR11614 Added updates BTCP_ROWCHANGEDBYUSRID
12.04.2005 SH SCR10772 Added BPH038 to calc discount, credit restriction, ... in
case of payment differences
14.02.2006 SH SCR10388 Changed 2. test to book the payment if there's a
difference, see SCR for more details
07.11.2005 SH SCR9432 Added check if partial payments must be reported to MQ100
13.10.2005 SH SCR9158 Changed handling for Allowed Discount and Not allowed
discount acoording to additional credit restriction handling
09.08.2005 SH SCR8771 TINP_BPIV_VARIABLETEXT will be only stored to BPIV if
GNRL_CODE <> 'NL', because in this case INVO_AWKAI is displayed as variable text
in OPH202B
14.04.2004 SH SCR4412 Added part to store entered variable text to BPIV and call
- now the new version of BPH112, which could also handle partial amounts, there-
- fore I removed the call to OPH202 B_002 Storing BPIV
17.03.2004 SH SCR5732 Fixed bug in part where the discounts will be booked if
- the remaining difference < 0 and equal to the discounts values
13.01.2004 SH SCR5205 Removed parameter PI.BPIV_VARIABLETEXT for the call to
- "OPH202 B_002 Storing BPIV"
29.09.2003 RR SCR4412 Extended Parameter-List of OPH202B_002
04.09.2003 SH SCR4265 Solved problems if ramaining difference =
- PI.ALLOWED_DISCOUNT or PI.NOTALLOWEDDISCOUNT
28.04.2003 SH SCR3285 If the differenece is not allowed, see task "Add Test to
- close payment" but the remaining differenec is exactly discount allowed
- or discount not allowed the payment can be booked automatically.
07.04.2003 SH SCR3283 If currencies equal GB002 will not be executed, target
- amount will be updated with the source amount in this case
09.10.2002 SH Changed list of arguments for BPH113 according to new SPECS
19.08.2002 SH Use the DATE() instead of BTCH_DATE as argument for GB002
30.07.2002 SH Add TINP_NOWBOOKED <> 0 to CND's if Invoices will be booked, see
- R.P., othrwise it was possible that invoices were booked without amounts if
- the user first selected a already handled invoice, then unselected the same
- invoice (in OPH202B). The row got the falg TINP_CHANGES = TUE and was handled
- in R.P., although there were no changes and then without amounts.
- 22.07.2002 SH Ask user to book differences and discounts only if there is
- differenece between the calculated difference and the allowed discount
- and not allowed discount = 0
- 11.07.2002 SH Set TINP_CHANGES to 'N' if row was handled, otherwise it's
- possible that the selected invoice will be booked twice, if the table TINP was
- not recreated in OPH202B if you come back from OPH202B6 and the payment
- could be booked directly (no remaining difference)
-- 03.07.2002 SH Get BTPC_ADMNO/CLNTNO/DEBC_DEBC now in R.P. before T.P.
- because if the first booking is running no BTPC rows are in the database and
- then the differences were booked without ADMNO/CLNTNO/DEBC_DEBC
-- 16.05.2002 SH SCR1273 Add additional test for allowed discounts if the actual
- difference < 0
-- 08.05.2002 SH v.T_ACTUAL_DIFFERENCE mult with *-1 now
-- SCR 50 --> OK
-- SCR#420 --> OK 17.12.2001 (Book payment with negative differences)
-- SCR#628 --> OK 28.01.2002 (Invalid TYPE Currency)
... PAYC variables related to GNRL_PAYMCODPARTPAYMENT
... PAYC variables related to GNRL_PAYMCODDIFFNOACTION
-- only relevant, when Button OK in OPH202B pressed, check for closing
-- payment
-- Use BTPC_ADMNO/CNTNO/DEBC_DEBC/DEBH from the first stored
-- BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE to book the differences
-- only when Button OK in OPH202B pressed
-- Get BTPC_ADMNO/CLNTNO/DEBC_DEBC to book the differences
-- If payment can't close, perform an additional test, if discounts are allowed
-- Delete BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE, when TINP_NOWBOOKED <> 0
-- and TINP_NOWBOOKED + TINP_HANDLED = 0
-- Storing BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE with the whole or partial invoice amonut
-- Additional checks/updates on BPIV
-- Get first BTPC_ADMNO/CLNTNO/DEBC_DEBC to book the differences, only
-- when USER pressed Button OK in OPH202B
-- Close payment, when the Actual difference = 0
-- Updates to the actual Batch, if payment can't be closed
-- ATTENTION: Table BTCH is opening in WRITE-Mode
-- In case of LinkQuery does not give any results
... give error to the users

ExpSyntax.val: 'Further payment handling not possible, because of failed LinkQuery on BTCH where BTCH_ID ='&Trim (Str ({1,1},'9'))&ASCIIChr (13)&ASCIIChr (10)&'Please contact IT-Department immediately'&ASCIIChr (13)&ASCIIChr (10)&'OPH202B_001;Updates to BTCH'

Text.val: -- Output parameters of BPH113 if differences have to be booked
if BP0038.PO.ALLPAYD <> 0
... calc PI.A_SUMINV for BPH038
... test if payment could be handeld with the payment difference
--- Payment difference is allowed, start final bookings
-- Only if the debtor payed not enough then it's possible to book the difference
automatically if equal to:
--> allowed discount + allowed credit restriction
or
--> not allowed discount + not allowed credit restriction
-- Storing --> Allowed discount/credit restriction
-- Storing --> Not allowed discount/credit restriction
-- Additional Updates to BTCH and BTCP
-- Close payment
-- the payment difference can be booked automatically if
1. GEST_YESNO (135) = YES
2. actual difference = allowed discount/credrestr and not allowed
discount/credrestr = 0
... else ask the user for acknowledgement
-- Book difference
-- Storing --> differences
... check if difference booking has to be reported to MQ100, perhaps
it has to be approved by a senior user
-- Storing --> Allowed discount/credrestr
-- Storing --> Not allowed discount/credrestr
-- Additional Updates to BTCH and BTCP
-- Close payment

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal (13,2)) from :1 WHERE BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: -- Updates to actual Batch and Payment, after book differences
-- ATTENTION: Tables BTCH and BTCP are opening in WRITE-Mode
-- In case of LinkQuery does not give any results
... give error to the users

ExpSyntax.val: 'Further payment handling not possible, because of failed LinkQuery on BTCH where BTCH_ID ='&Trim (Str ({1,1},'9'))&ASCIIChr (13)&ASCIIChr (10)&'Please contact IT-Department immediately'&ASCIIChr (13)&ASCIIChr (10)&'OPH202B_001;Updates to BTCH and BTCP'

Text.val: ... check if above precentages
... check if above amount
set variable = FALSE, because if both tests have to be performed, both have
be TRUE
... update check code
-- Get BTPC_ADMNO/CLNTNO/DEBC_DEBC from the first stored
-- BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOIVE. Relevant to book the differences!
-- If a BATCH_PAYMENT_INVOICE is deleted the BTCP_AMOUNTBOOKEDCURRPAY
-- must update with the amount of the deleted BPIV-row
-- Attention: Table open in Write-Mode
-- Store entered variable text to BPIV, also if BPH112 was not called; in this
case the user entered/changed the variable text for an already existing
BPIV row.
-- Check if partial payment has to be reported to MQ100
... check if above precentages
... check if above amount
set variable = FALSE, because if both tests have to be performed, both have
be TRUE
... update check code
... PAYC variables related to GNRL_PAYMCODPARTPAYMENT
... PAYC variables related to GNRL_PAYMCODDIFFNOACTION
